channel.title: Comments on: How to Get Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) in Nigeria Online
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-get-your-tax-identification-number-tin-in-nigeria-online/#comment-1387">Debbie</a>.
Yes, you can use different email accounts, but it is always good to have the same email account for everything business.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Debbie.

Yes, you can use different email accounts, but it is always good to have the same email account for everything business.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-get-your-tax-identification-number-tin-in-nigeria-online/#comment-1395">GODWIN IME</a>.
The best way to troubleshoot your team number is to visit the nearest FIRS office to you. They would advise.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to GODWIN IME.

The best way to troubleshoot your team number is to visit the nearest FIRS office to you. They would advise.

item.title: By: Debbie
item.dc:creator: Debbie
item.description: Hi, must it be the email address that I used in CAC that I must use in registering my business tin. Can I use another email?
item.content:encoded:
Hi, must it be the email address that I used in CAC that I must use in registering my business tin.
Can I use another email?

item.content:encoded:

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-get-your-tax-identification-number-tin-in-nigeria-online/#comment-1096">Joseph Gbenga</a>.
It takes up to a week in most cases.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Gbenga.

It takes up to a week in most cases.
